description: Returns a list of source account links that are linked to this monitoring account sink. To use this operation, provide the sink ARN. To retrieve a list of sink ARNs, use ListSinks. To find a list of links for one source account, use ListLinks.

parameters.name: SinkIdentifier
parameters.description: The ARN of the sink that you want to retrieve links for.

nested_items.name: Items
nested_items.description: An array of structures that contain the information about the attached links.

nested_items.name: Label
nested_items.description: The label that was assigned to this link at creation, with the variables resolved to their actual values.

nested_items.name: ResourceTypes
nested_items.description: The resource types supported by this link.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use when requesting the next set of links.
